text: You seem to be doing well, Hiori.

Yes,
I'm not too tired, and I can concentrate.

When it's time to rest, rest.
It's thanks to the Producer's advice.

I haven't done anything.
It's thanks to your self-management, Hiori.
Even though the Producer kindly spoke to me.

I responded with a disrespectful attitude,
not just causing worry but also rebutting...

I'm reflecting on it.
I'm sorry.

Oh, Hiori didn't say anything wrong, and I'm happy
that she's actively participating in the training camp.

And surely... even if I hadn't pointed it out,
Hiori would have realized it.

That's not true...!
If the Producer hadn't pointed it out...

Haha... But I'm watching over everyone,
you know.

You're welcome!
But, that's not something to boast about...!

Hehe... Even after we return from the training camp,
please take care of us, Producer.
